text: Kaptan Singh Solanki (born 1 July 1939) is an Indian politician. He is a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. From 2018 to 2019, he was Governor of Tripura. From August 2009, he was the member of the Parliament of India representing Madhya Pradesh State in the Rajya Sabha. From 2014 to 2018, he was Governor of Haryana. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tripura Category:Governors of Haryana Category:Governors of Punjab, India Category:Administrators of Chandigarh Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Kaptan Singh Solanki
